The following are the original text and the summary.

[Original]
{ORIGINAL_TEXT}

[Summary]
{SUMMARY_TEXT}

According to the above instructions, determine whether each line of the summary (lines are separated by "\n") is supported by the original text.
Assign "Y", "N", or "X" to each line.

The output must be in valid JSON format.
Example return format:
[
{"text": "summary sentence 1", "label": "Y"},
{"text": "summary sentence 2", "label": "N"},
{"text": "summary sentence 3", "label": "X"}
]

Do not output any additional explanations, comments, natural language sentences, or meta text.
Output only the JSON array.
